metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9072 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is an attempted excessive memory allocation in setup_group in elf.c.

notes.Note: sbeattie> upstream has marked this as invalid mdeslaur> disputed by upstream, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
